prompts: Create a futuristic electric-type Pokemon with metallic features and a sleek design.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a floating machine with shiny surfaces and glowing lights.
Generate an electric and steel-type Pokemon inspired by technology and magnetism.
Make a Pokemon that has a circular body with protruding parts, resembling advanced machinery.
Imagine a robot-like Pokemon that combines elements of electricity and magnetism in its appearance.
Design a Pokemon that captures the essence of magnetism, with a unique and modern look.
Show me an electric-type Pokemon that embodies the concept of magnetism with a scientific twist.

distinctive_features: Three spherical magnets protruding from its sides
A large round body with a metallic finish
